spec.name: Zaouiya Kadiriya Boudchichiya Sidi Lkhadir
spec.description: This is a specific location (Zaouiya) of the prominent **Qadiriyya Boutchichiyya Sufi order**, likely associated with the nearby Sidi El Khadir site. These zaouiyas are spiritual centers crucial for the Sufi community's religious practices, meditation, and leadership.

people.comment: The spiritual head of the Qadiriyya Boutchichiyya Sufi order.

access.comment: Access is generally restricted to members of the Sufi order or with prior permission.
